author: Canadian Press
title: Quebec hotel workers in three cities strike over lagging contract talks
text:
MONTREAL — About 2,600 unionized employees from hotels in some of the province's largest cities walked off the job Thursday, protesting an impasse in contract talks.
The 24-hour strike hit 23 hotels in Montreal, Quebec City and Sherbrooke.
Éric Hamel, general manager of an association representing Montreal hotels, said that despite the strike it was business as usual in the city.
Negotiations between hotel owners and the workers' union — Confédération des syndicats nationaux (CSN) — have stalled since the union first threatened a provincewide strike last week.
Hotel employees have seven key demands, including a 36 per cent pay raise over four years and an end to the use of private employment agencies.
Hamel says the employers are ready to negotiate but do not have the capacity to pay the salary demands.
The strike involved 16 Montreal hotels, including the Queen Elizabeth, Bonaventure and The Ritz-Carlton, five in the Quebec City region and two in Sherbrooke.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published Aug. 8, 2024.
The Canadian Press

author: Valeria Tosso
title: Accidente en Carabayllo: conductora herida luego de que su moto embistiera una combi
text:
Accidente en Carabayllo: conductora herida luego de que su moto embistiera una combi
Un accidente de tránsito en Carabayllo dejó heridos tras la colisión de una motocicleta con una combi. El incidente se registró en la intersección de la Avenida Túpac Amaru con Jr. Arequipa.
En horas de la tarde de este miércoles 9 de abril, se reportó un accidente de tránsito en el distrito de Carabayllo, cuando una motocicleta colisionó contra una combi. Los heridos fueron trasladados de emergencia al Hospital de Collique.
El personal de Serenazgo de la Municipalidad de Carabayllo informó que el accidente ocurrió en la intersección de la Avenida Túpac Amaru con Jr. Arequipa, a la altura del kilómetro 15. La colisión se produjo de forma repentina tras una maniobra de tránsito fallida.
PUEDES VER:
[Estas universidades no dictarán clases presenciales por el paro de transportistas del 10 de abril]
Accidente de tránsito en Carabayllo deja heridos
El accidente ocurrió en el distrito de Carabayllo, cuando una motocicleta impactó contra una combi. El incidente sucedió en la intersección de la Avenida Túpac Amaru, a la altura del kilómetro 15. La motocicleta, conducida por Ángel Guevara Villanueva, colisionó contra la parte trasera de la combi de placa T5F-042, cuyo conductor fue Julio César Huámán Pózo.
Tras el impacto, la persona afectada fue rápidamente auxiliada por personal de salud del municipio, siendo trasladada de inmediato al Hospital de Collique para recibir atención médica. Por otro lado, el conductor de la combi fue llevado a la Comisaría de Santa Isabel, donde se iniciaron las investigaciones correspondientes.
PUEDES VER:
[Escolar logra escapar tras estar días secuestrada y ser violentada por hombre en Arequipa]

author: 王晨曦
title: 凭准考证就能享受天猫618优惠"叠中叠"，高考三件套至高立减4000_科技_中国网
text:
近日，全国各地高考陆续落下帷幕，高考考后消费迎来高峰，手机、电脑、平板等电子三件套销量爆发。
天猫618期间，淘宝天猫联合苹果、华为、小米、vivo、OPPO、荣耀、联想、华硕、索尼等70多家家头部3C数码品牌，针对准大学生和在校大学生们推出专属福利。6月9日至20日，消费者打开淘宝搜“数码教育优惠”即可直达专区。
据页面显示，该专区包含2025届高考生、在校大学生等两种教育优惠认证，覆盖MacBook、AirPods、iPad等Apple教育优惠商品和非Apple商品。叠加立减85折、国补、大额券、以及学生专享价等多重优惠后迎来特价，至高立减4000元。
以ROG 枪神9游戏电脑为例，原价14999元起，店铺满减2000元，学生专享50元，限时补贴400元、88VIP消费券500元，国家补贴2000元，叠加各种优惠后到手价10049元，整整便宜了4950元。
数据显示，高考结束以来，平板电脑、手机、相机等产品在天猫618迎来销量大涨，其中，笔记本电脑销量同比增长200%，数码相机销量同比增长190%。联想拯救者系列、华硕天选6pro、荣耀笔记本X14、华为nova14、REDMI K80Pro、荣耀400、vivo S30、华为WATCH FIT4、索尼ZV-1F等爆款单品备受学生群体欢迎。
今年天猫618主打“最便宜、最简单”，玩法简化为“官方立减15%”无需凑单，一件就能打85折。在品牌立减85折的基础上，天猫再发品类券、以及9折无门槛88VIP消费券，叠加至高20%的国家补贴，多重折扣后3C数码品牌的优惠力度也刷新全网新低。

topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing
Economy, Business and Finance->products and services

author: Mitchell Jones
title: Nissan Navara NP300 gets 800hp GT-R engine conversion - PerformanceDrive
text:
English tuning giants Severn Valley Motorsport have created the ultimate Navara by transplanting the VR35DETT engine from the R 35 GT-R, in lieu of the pedestrian 2.3-litre turbo-diesel.
The work goes far beyond a mere transplant, with power bumped up to 800hp (596kW). Plenty of other tuning options are available too, with the company claiming that a face-melting 1500hp(1120kW) is also available if your wallet is fat enough.
This NP300 also adopts the GT-R’s dual-clutch transmission and all-wheel drive drivetrain, with the capability of installing a manual gearbox also being mentioned.
Externally, a deep chin front end and bodykit with matt and red highlights completes the visual package and sets the tradies’ favourite apart from the worksite special.
As one might expect, the price for this insanity is stratospheric; £175,000 (AU$328,000), for something which would make a Maloo wet its bed and destroy its bedliner in the process.
Luke Anthony from the company said: “we are open to the craziest of ideas”, so sky’s the limit when it comes to turning the Navara workhorse into a mind-blowingly fast machine. Speaking of which, there is no mention of performance figures or quarter mile times at this point.
This Navara is not the only vehicle to feature a GT-R driveline swap; the famous Nissan Juke-R came with the twin-turbo engine, installed and engineered for fun by Nissan Europe engineers.
